skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Building responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React.js,Next.js,CSS and modern front-end tools.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Developing robust server-side applications with Node.js and Express.js to ensure seamless functionality.

skills.title: Mobile App Development
skills.description: Cross-platform mobile apps using React Native for optimized user experiences.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Designing intuitive user experiences and visually appealing interfaces that enhance user engagement.

portfolio.title: Social Blender
portfolio.description: AI-powered SaaS platform for customized display pictures and uploading videos build Next.js, Cloudinary, MongoDB, and Tailwind CSS for seamless content management.

portfolio.title: Heel Harbor
portfolio.description: A React Native mobile app deployed on Vercel, featuring a tool to convert images for social media display pictures. Built with React Native, Zustand, and Tailwind CSS.

portfolio.title: Space Tourism
portfolio.description: An interactive web platform for showcasing space tourism options with a strong focus on user experience and accessibility. Built with React.js, Zustand, and Chakra UI.
